title: Virtually flawless, the ultimate classic movie!
review: For a film that in 1942, was considered to be just 1 movie in 52 cranked out by Warner Bros, Casablanca stands head and shoulders above them all.This classic tale has everything going for it, with all the elements to great storytelling; romance, friendship, loyalty, courage, sacrifice and adventure.After repeated viewings, the film never fails to electrify, or bring a tear to the eye.If ever you wish to choose one classic film from the golden age of Hollywood, this award-winning film should be in your collection!
